Kuroma uses his [[sealing tag]]s to use the five [[Nature Transformation|element natures]]. 

*'''Fire''' (火): Kuroma shoots balls of fire at the opponent.
*'''Earth''' (土): Kuroma shakes the area around the opponent, who could get damaged. 
*'''Water''' (水): Kuroma creates a flow of gushing water under the opponent which traps them in a sphere of water. Kuroma can perform an attack while the opponent is trapped. This technique is similar to [[Water Prison Technique]], though Kuroma doesn't need to keep his arm in the sphere of water.
*'''Wind''' (風): Kuroma unleashes a wave of wind that slashes at the opponent.
*'''Lightning''' (雷): Kuroma fires a wave of lightning bolts at the opponent.

[[es:Jutsu de Sellado: Cinco Elementos]]
